message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11500. I think this is a great price considering the value the product brings to you.

I understand you're still looking to save some money, Bob. However, I'm getting close to my minimum price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $11350. This is as low as I can go, considering the value the product brings to you.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $11250 for the product. I think this is the best compromise considering the value it brings to me.
